events: Installed WordPress and activated Astra theme
Imported the Digital Agency template via Starter Templates
Encountered issues with Elementor import and re-imported the template
Accessed WordPress dashboard and navigated to Elementor editor
Updated homepage hero section with headline 'Get Script + Voiceovers in 15 Minutes' and corresponding subtext and CTA
Site is live on temporary URL, with plans to switch to CreatorVoice.in soon
notes: Excellent progress today. The site is up and running, and you have overcome setup challenges. A big win for CreatorVoice!
